text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide fhir.example

ExampleIG

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://example.org/ImplementationGuide/fhir.example

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: ARAT上肢功能評估問卷
resource.description: ARAT上肢功能評估問卷的完整實例，根據Yozbatiran, Der-Yeghiaian, and Cramer(2008)建立，可提供實際使用 。亦可依據Profile: QuestionnaireProfile內容做為範本進行擴充

resource.name: ARAT上肢功能評估問卷回覆
resource.description: 針對ARAT上肢功能評估問卷的QuestionnaireResponse Profile，強制回傳格式符合問卷結構

resource.name: ARAT問卷回覆範例
resource.description: 一位中風患者進行ARAT上肢功能評估的完整問卷回覆範例，包含所有測試項目分數、完成時間及自動計算總分

resource.name: ARAT評估Bundle範例
resource.description: 包含患者、治療師及問卷回覆的完整評估資料包

resource.name: Barthel Index 總值集
resource.description: 整合 Barthel Index 各題之所有選項值集

resource.name: BBTQR
resource.description: Box and Block Test (BBT) 評估量表問卷回覆

resource.name: Bundle-評估資料回傳
resource.description: 此 Profile 定義了上肢功能評估資料須包含的資訊。

resource.name: Encounter
resource.description: 就醫事件的標準化定義。

resource.name: FMAUE動作評估問卷回覆
resource.description: 針對FMAUE上肢動作評估問卷的QuestionnaireResponse Profile，強制回傳格式符合問卷結構

resource.name: FMAUE感覺評估問卷回覆
resource.description: 針對FMAUE上肢感覺評估問卷的QuestionnaireResponse Profile，強制回傳格式符合問卷結構

resource.name: Fugl-Meyer上肢動作評估問卷
resource.description: 衛福部Fugl-Meyer上肢動作評估問卷的完整實例，可提供實際使用。亦可依據Profile: QuestionnaireProfile內容做為範本進行擴充

resource.name: Fugl-Meyer上肢動作評估問卷回覆範例
resource.description: 針對 Fugl-Meyer 上肢動作評估問卷的完整回覆範例，展示左側上肢動作功能評估結果

resource.name: Fugl-Meyer上肢感覺評估問卷
resource.description: 衛福部Fugl-Meyer上肢感覺評估問卷的完整實例，可提供實際使用。亦可依據Profile: QuestionnaireProfile內容做為範本進行擴充

resource.name: Fugl-Meyer上肢感覺評估問卷回覆範例
resource.description: 針對Fugl-Meyer上肢感覺評估問卷的完整回覆範例

resource.name: IADL評估問卷回覆
resource.description: 針對IADL評估問卷的QuestionnaireResponse Profile，強制回傳格式符合問卷結構

resource.name: MAS 量表問卷回覆
resource.description: Modified Ashworth Scale (MAS) 評估量表問卷回覆

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationCode
resource.description: Return administrations of this medication code

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationContext
resource.description: Return administrations that share this encounter or episode of care

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationDevice
resource.description: Return administrations with this administration device identity

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationEffectivetime
resource.description: Date administration happened (or did not happen)

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationIdentifier
resource.description: Return administrations with this external identifier

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationMedication
resource.description: Return administrations of this medication resource

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationPatient
resource.description: The identity of a patient to list administrations for

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationPerformer
resource.description: The identity of the individual who administered the medication

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationReasonnotgiven
resource.description: Reasons for not administering the medication

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationRequest
resource.description: The identity of a request to list administrations from

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationStatus
resource.description: MedicationAdministration event status (for example one of active/paused/completed/nullified)

resource.name: MedicationAdministrationSubject
resource.description: The identity of the individual or group to list administrations for

resource.name: MMSE QuestionnaireResponse (scored)
resource.description: MMSE 回覆：分數題逐題填答，總分需等於所有分數項目加總。

resource.name: MMSE評估量表
resource.description: 簡易心智狀況檢查表 (Mini-Mental State Examination, MMSE)

resource.name: MRC 評估量表
resource.description: MRC肌力測試 (Medical Research Council Scale)

resource.name: My FHIR Client Capability Statement
resource.description: 此 CapabilityStatement 定義了用戶端（Client）應支援的 FHIR RESTful API 功能。用戶端建議應該（SHOULD）使用伺服端能力聲明中的查詢參數，支援讀取和查詢一個或多個 FHIR Profile。

resource.name: My FHIR Server Capability Statement
resource.description: 此 CapabilityStatement 定義了伺服端必須支援的 FHIR RESTful API 功能

resource.name: PACCarePlan
resource.description: PAC照護計畫的標準化定義的內容

resource.name: PACCondition
resource.description: 進行患者上肢功能評估時的狀況資訊，應包含待評估身體部位或病徵。

resource.name: Patient
resource.description: 病人的資料定義範例，包含姓名、識別碼等基本資訊

resource.name: Patient Everything Operation
resource.description: 取得該病人完整相關資源快照，回傳一個包含所有相關資源的Bundle

resource.name: Practitioner
resource.description: 健康照護服務提供者的標準化定義。

resource.name: PractitionerRole
resource.description: 健康照護服務提供者角色的標準化定義。

resource.name: WMFT上肢功能評估問卷
resource.description: WMFT上肢功能評估問卷的完整實例，根據Wolf et al., 1995; Whitall, Savin, Harris-Love, & Waller, 2006建立，可提供實際使用 。亦可依據Profile: QuestionnaireProfile內容做為範本進行擴充

resource.name: WMFT上肢功能評估問卷回覆
resource.description: 針對WMFT上肢功能評估問卷的QuestionnaireResponse Profile，強制回傳格式符合問卷結構

resource.name: WMFT上肢功能評估問卷回覆範例
resource.description: 針對 WMFT 上肢功能評估問卷的完整回覆範例，展示右側上肢功能評估結果，包含功能評分與完成時間記錄

resource.name: 中風患者範例
resource.description: 右側中風患者，接受左側上肢功能評估

resource.name: 健康照護服務提供者角色資料範例
resource.description: 一名健康照護服務提供者角色的範例

resource.name: 健康狀態篩檢與評估範例
resource.description: 一個健康狀態篩檢與評估的範例

resource.name: 巴氏量表問卷回覆
resource.description: 針對巴氏量表問卷的QuestionnaireResponse Profile，強制回傳格式符合問卷結構

resource.name: 復健治療師範例
resource.description: 執行ARAT評估的職能治療師

resource.name: 評估問卷
resource.description: 評估問卷的結構化定義，實際問卷內容請參考Structure: Questionnaire，可依據前者內容做為範本進行擴充

resource.name: 評估問卷回覆
resource.description: 問卷回覆的結構化定義，實際問回覆內容可參考Examples，可依據前者內容做為範本進行擴充

resource.name: 身體部位與結構對應之Snomed CT 代碼
resource.description: 收錄復健可能會使用到的身體部位代碼

resource.name: 項目測試時間
resource.description: 記錄單一測試項目的完成時間

page.title: 結構定義與範例檔下載
